name: agent
title: Agent
description: A person, group, organization or other entity that can act.

fields.name: agentID
fields.title: Agent ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: agentType
fields.title: Agent Type
fields.description: A category that best matches the nature of an Agent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: agentTypeIRI
fields.title: Agent Type IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for a type of Agent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: agentTypeVocabulary
fields.title: Agent Type Vocabulary
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in agentType is given.

fields.name: preferredAgentName
fields.title: Preferred Agent Name
fields.description: A name of an Agent preferred in searches and results.
